original_text: Be careful! Do not forget the covenant that the Lord your God has made with you. Do not make for yourselves any kind of image as your idol. That is the command that he has given to you.
korean_text: 너희는 스스로 삼가 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희와 세우신 언약을 잊지 말고 네 하나님 여호와께서 금하신 어떤 형상의 우상도 조각하지 말라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God has made with you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 하나님 여호와께서 너희와 세우신 언약

sentences.original_text: Do not make for yourselves any kind of image
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 위하여 어떤 형상도 만들지 말라

sentences.original_text: that he has given to you
